title: International Economy: Trump’s policies through the Mundell-Fleming model
text:
This project is an analysis of Donald Trump’s economic policies through the lens of the Mundell-Fleming model, which is a framework used to understand the interactions between exchange rates, interest rates, and output in an open economy. The report examines how Trump’s policies, such as tax cuts, trade tariffs, and deregulation, impacted the U.S. economy in terms of exchange rates, interest rates, and overall economic output. The analysis also explores the implications of these policies for international trade and capital flows, providing insights into the broader effects on the global economy.



 Back to top

title: Strategic Consultancy Report: Siemens Healthineers
text:
This project is a strategic consultancy report for Siemens Healthineers, a leading global medical technology company. The report provides an in-depth analysis of the company’s current market position, competitive landscape, and strategic challenges. It also offers actionable recommendations to enhance Siemens Healthineers’ market share and profitability in the rapidly evolving healthcare industry.



 Back to top

title: Advanced Portfolio Management: Investment Portfolio
text:
In this project, I created an investment portfolio using the Markowitz Portfolio Optimization model. The goal was to maximize returns while minimizing risk by selecting a diversified mix of assets. I analyzed historical data, calculated expected returns and covariances, and used optimization techniques to determine the optimal asset allocation. The resulting portfolio was designed to achieve a balance between risk and return, providing a solid foundation for long-term investment success.



 Back to top
